title: 820-3115-b ppbus g3hot is varrying
message:
hi..
 ihave a macbook pro a1278..part no is 820-3115-b
when i recieve the board..there is no greenlight...found isl6259 is faulty..i change it...green light is ok..but ppbusg3hot is not correct...check sensing resistors..
also change resisters...now board is turn on....but ppbus volt is varrying 12.5 to 9 v...but the board is working...any solution

title: 820-3115-b ppbus g3hot is varrying
message: also change R7021,R7022 Resistors..because there is value is not correct

title: 820-3115-b ppbus g3hot is varrying
message:
Post exact resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7100; remove power first!

3V42_G3H varies too?

BTW, write directly on the Reply box, don't click Reply button.
I don't see any reason to quote an entire post, visible few centimeters above.

title: 820-3115-b ppbus g3hot is varrying
message:
What about 3V42_G3H?
Stable voltage at F6905?
Are you using original Magsafe 60/85W charger?

title: 820-3115-b ppbus g3hot is varrying
